the 1st st in the same space as the beginning chain ● double_crochet increase 3dc forms the chevron peak sk2 forms the valley ● each double_crochet increase 3dc is made in the middle st of the peak from the previous row ● changing colors with the tiny cluster technique yo insert hook into the last stitch of the previous row yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo insert hook into the ​same​
